name: autoclaved
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
autoclave
to clean and remove all the bacteria from medical instruments and other equipment in an autoclave: Lewis estimates that 40 to 80 percent of dentists actually autoclave their instruments as they should. Cages are to be autoclaved regularly.
More examplesFewer examplesNeedle bars and tubes should be autoclaved after each customer.All laundry and waste should be placed in biohazard bags and autoclaved before being laundered or incinerated.Anthrax spores can be killed by autoclaving.
